body:
[CLOSED] Congrats 99


Hi

I am going to give away my password for my mojang account randomly so reply with your favorite flavor of ice cream and I'll add you to this amazing contest.

Also put your skype so I can give you the password.

Closes 9/4/15 at 3 EST

(Also a leaving thread if you can't figure that out)

How dare you call me and smit two faced when you're all buddy buddy with us for 4 months then we kick you from a damn FACTION as a joke and you become this massive fucking dick. You destroy everything we work for on HCF and make up a bunch of little bitch ass excuses about how you supposedly "worked" for all of that. Fuck yourself. Not only that, but you pull this hippocritical shit calling me a "sado" for hacking on kohi when you hacked on avicus, parapots, and kohi several times.
